Pigment -- drawings Typically linear application of pigment, for example, clay 'crayons'
Pigment -- paintings Wet application of pigment onto surface
Engraved -- abraded Engravings created through direct abrasion
Engraved -- pecked Engravings created through pecking or percussion
Engraved with pigment applied Engravings with pigment applied
